titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at St. Mildred's Poultrey, January 3. 1696/7 By John Lord Bishop of Chichester, and late rector of the said church, upon his leaving that parish.
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside, near Mercers Chappel, and Ralph Smith, at the Bible on the south-side of the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
